text: "Ye Brahmin hai.. maaro..maaro ise.. Mere kapde faade... Meri video banayi.. Jab tak main behosh nahi hone lagi tab tak mujhe maarte rahe." - Journalist Ruchi Tiwari who was groped and attacked by pro UGC protesters in DU. source :
